arts.ttl: Leicester vs Portsmouth predictions: Foxes to maintain unbeaten run
arts.sum: Tom McGarry expects Leicester to maintain their unbeaten run and keep a clean-sheet when they welcome Portsmouth to the King Power Stadium for Saturday's late kick-off in the Championship.
